summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Sixteen Hundred Seventy-eight and 20/100 ($1678.20) Dollars, or so much thereof as may be necessary from the General Fund of the City of Seattle to be paid into the registry of the court, as an advance, for the payment of the awards and costs in Cause No. 60301, entitled, "In the matter of the petition of The City of Seattle to condemn, appropriate and damage private property for the purpose of changing and establishing the grades and grading and regrading Mercer Street in said city, from Boren Avenue North to Terry Avenue North, as provided for and specified in Ordinance No. 17764 of said City, approved January 16, 1908."
